creator: Lowe, Jet
title: 28.  12-INCH VERTICAL PUG MILL, MANUFACTURED BY THE CROSSLEY MANUFACTURING CO. OF TRENTON, NJ. IT WAS PURCHASED IN 1902, AND USED AT THE FIRST MORAVIAN POTTERY AND TILE WORKS BEFORE BEING MOVED TO IS PRESENT LOCATION IN 1912. AFTER THE PURCHASE OF THE BRICK AUGER, IT WAS PROBABLY USED TO MIX PIGMENT INTO BUFF CLAY TO PRODUCE COLORED-BODIED CLAYS. - Moravian Pottery & Tile Works, Southwest side of State Route 313 (Swamp Road), Northwest of East Court Street, Doylestown, Bucks County, PA
